q: United Center-- as the Detroit Pistons trounced the Chicago Bulls, 110-83. "Thats the most points I've ever scored," Jerry Stackhouse said, who is the NBA's second-leading scorer behind former teammate Allen Iverson . This is the highest level of Marcus Gilbert that you can play and I can say that I did this. It is definitely something I will remember for a long time. And I really think I can do it again. Michael Jordan did most of his prolific scoring in Chicago Stadium prior to his first retirement and never scored more than 55 points in the United Center, which opened in 1994. their views on Google's business practices by February 11. The Commission is expected to take several months to digest the feedback. Google on Monday reiterated that it was co-operating with the regulator. There's always going to be room for improvement, so we'll be working with the Commission to address any concerns, spokesman Al Verney said. I suspect I always will. I take the blame because, ultimately, it was my responsibility. I am not asking for any sympathy, I suspect that I am unlikely to get any here today. If a rogue reporter decides to behave in that fashion, I am not sure there is an awful lot more I could have done. I have never condoned the use of phone hacking and nor do I have any recollection of incidences where phone hacking took place.
